title: [Update Failed] Unspecified Error Occured. Please Check The Logs For More Information
body:
So the other day I was about to play a normal's game, until my league game turned black, after waiting a bit, it said i was missing some files. The instructions were told to reinstall league, which I followed the instructions on the the league support site. After doing that, I waited patiently for the launcher to load and at 99%, a message popped up and said the following message ;  "[Update Failed] Unspecified Error Occured. Please Check The Logs For More Information" or click retry. I clicked retry, but it started me back at 0%, giving me the same message shortly afterwards. I looked this up on how to fix and it led me to the ,"Comprehensive Troubleshooting Your Patching Issues" site. I followed every single solution possible to solve this problem, yet no luck. If anyone can suggest any sort of help that I may have skipped over or an alternate way someone has found out how to solve this problem, please tell me. 

Also, I am playing on a laptop not meant for gaming, and it is pretty old. I don't know if my laptop is to old or has some problem or if it is just my game that has a problem.

replies.body:
Failure during patching at the last 66% of the process is usually caused by network connection drops to the patching servers. Since you've already worked through our connection guide, I'd like you to reach out to our tech team who will be able to work more closely with you to pinpoint the cause. You can reach out in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and I highly recommend attaching a set of logs using our [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367).

Let me know if you have any questions.

Hello, can you try using Hextech Repair Tool:
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool
